              ,
               
              with
               
              my
               
              dagger
               
              in
               
              their
               
              bosoms
              ,
               
              grandsire
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
No
              ,
               
              boy
              ,
               
              not
               
              so
              .
               
              I’ll
               
              teach
               
              thee
               
              another
               
              course
              .
              —

speaker: TITUS
text:
Lavinia
              ,
               
              come
              .
              —
              Marcus
              ,
               
              look
               
              to
               
              my
               
              house
              .

speaker: TITUS
text:
Lucius
               
              and
               
              I’ll
               
              go
               
              brave
               
              it
               
              at
               
              the
               
              court
              ;

speaker: TITUS
text:
Ay
              ,
               
              marry
              ,
               
              will
               
              we
              ,
               
              sir
              ,
               
              and
               
              we’ll
               
              be
               
              waited
               
              on
              .

speaker: MARCUS
text:
O
               
              heavens
              ,
               
              can
               
              you
               
              hear
               
              a
               
              good
               
              man
               
              groan

speaker: MARCUS
text:
And
               
              not
               
              relent
              ,
               
              or
               
              not
               
              compassion
               
              him
              ?

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Marcus
              ,
               
              attend
               
              him
               
              in
               
              his
               
              ecstasy
              ,

speaker: MARCUS
text:
That
               
              hath
               
              more
               
              scars
               
              of
               
              sorrow
               
              in
               
              his
               
              heart

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Than
               
              foemen’s
               
              marks
               
              upon
               
              his
               
              battered
               
              shield
              ,

speaker: MARCUS
text:
But
               
              yet
               
              so
               
              just
               
              that
               
              he
               
              will
               
              not
               
              revenge
              .

speaker: MARCUS
text:
Revenge
               
              the
               
              heavens
               
              for
               
              old
               
              Andronicus
              !
